response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth to you. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, we propose a transaction price of $14,000. This price not only ensures a fair deal but also leaves room for both of us to benefit from this exchange. Should you find this proposal agreeable, please let us know, and we'll proceed with the details. We're confident that this product will significantly enhance your experience and contribute positively to your endeavors. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
